page.title: 10AMBERLEY C. of E. SCHOOL
page.content: The school was opened on the 12/5/67. Surrounded by a large playing area with an outdoor swimming pool, it is a modern building with classrooms opening on to a central hall. There are 60 children whose ages range from 4.5 to 10 years. Most of these children now come from Storrington. The rest come from Amberley itself or the surrounding villages. The morning staff consists of a headteacher, one full time and one part time teacher, each with their own class. In the afternoon the three classes merge into two. The present headmaster has held this post for 20 years. Other members of staff include a welfare assistant and secretary. School lunches are cooked on site with a kitchen staff of a cook and two school meal supervisors Annual events include Sports Day, Amberley Revels and a xmas production.
